turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I am going to be on my way to the office soon. Could you order my coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Where do you want it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! I can place the order for the location on 4th Street. Does that work?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's on my way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Do you know what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will have the dark roast of the day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, sounds good. Tall, Medium or venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a Venti. It will be a long day today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. Any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Any sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, its ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. I am placing the order right now. Anything else you'd like to get?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Just the coffee today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Placing the order. One sec.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done. It will be ready in 4 minutes at the location of 4th street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: remember you can't park on 4th but you can pull over by the entrance and make a quick run.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good reminder.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be under your name on the front counter.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. thanks, see you soon.
